data.name: key_cache_age_threshold
data.type: the lower the setting, the more quickly buffers move from the hot key cache sublist to the warm sublist.

data.name: key_cache_division_limit
data.type: percentage to use for the warm key cache buffer list (the remainder is allocated between the hot and cold caches).

data.name: key_cache_file_hash_size
data.type: number of hash buckets for open and changed files. if you have many myisam files open you should increase this for faster flushing of changes. a good value is probably 1/10th of the number of possible open myisam files.

data.name: myisam_max_sort_file_size
data.type: maximum size in bytes of the temporary file used while recreating a myisam index. if the this size is exceeded, the slower process of using the key cache is done instead.

data.name: myisam_mmap_size
data.type: maximum memory in bytes that can be used for memory mapping compressed myisam files. too high a value may result in swapping if there are many compressed myisam tables.
